citation: Proclamation under the Education Legislation Amendments (Education Regulation) Act 2022 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Education Legislation Amendments (Education Regulation) Act 2022

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Education Legislation Amendments (Education Regulation) Act 2022 fix 1 July 2023 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

8 May 2023

A. M. BLOW

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

R. C. JAENSCH

Minister for Education, Children and Youth

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 17 May 2023

This proclamation is administered in the Department for Education, Children and Young People.
